subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
Shoes and Boots
lead_paragraph: After losing a shoe in a sixth-place finish in the Preakness, Mucho Macho Man has new footwear, and his trainer is optimistic about the Belmont.
snippet: After losing a shoe in a sixth-place finish in the Preakness, Mucho Macho Man has new footwear, and his trainer is optimistic about the Belmont.
